author: achapman
title: Manchester United transfer news: Bayern Munich join Nelson Semedo race as they look for Philipp Lahm replacement

organizations.name: everton lin the money manchester united

text:
Full Nelson Manchester United transfer news: Bayern Munich join Nelson Semedo race as they look for Philipp Lahm replacement 
Germans keen on signing new right-back despite interest from Red Devils who are already signing teammate Victor Lindelof By ANTHONY CHAPMAN Comments BAYERN MUNICH have joined the race for reported Manchester United target Nelson Semedo. 
The Benfica right-back has been strongly linked with an Old Trafford switch as doubts remain over the future of Matteo Darmian . Getty Images 5 Bayern Munich have joined the hunt for Nelson Semedo 
Juventus are keen and Jose Mourinho could sanction his exit this month after giving the green light for Morgan Schneiderlin’s move to Everton . Keep up to date with ALL the Manchester United news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
However, the Special One is keen to ensure there’s competition available for Antonio Valencia and has apparently identified Semedo as the ideal man for the job. 
But United now face a mission to land the Portuguese ace, with newspaper O Jogo claiming interest from German giants Bayern . Getty Images United are lining him up as a replacement for Matteo Darmian Manchester United star Juan Mata goes bowling and scores a great strike Getty Images 5 Semedo could replace Philipp Lahm at Bayern 
Current right-backs Philipp Lahm and Rafinha are aged 33 and 31 respectively, and both have just 18 months remaining on their current contracts. 
Lahm plans to retire once his deal expires at the Allianz Arena and Carlo Ancelotti wants to make sure Bayern have a replacement waiting in the wings. Keep up-to-date with all the latest transfer news and gossip ahead of the January window with SunSport's daily LIVE blog Related Stories get bak Manchester United attempt to beat Manchester City and Chelsea in race to sign Monaco star Tiemoue Bakayoko Transfers live All the latest breaking news and gossip from the January transfer window Last Supper? Man United exile Morgan Schneiderlin enjoys farewell meal with pal Juan Mata ahead of his move to Everton Lin The Money Manchester United's deal for Victor Lindelof to go ahead as Benfica and Vasteras agree sell-on fee Getty Images Semedo has already revealed he's happy in Portugal Getty Images 5 Victor Lindelof is already on his way to Man Utd 
The Bundesliga champs also have a good relationship with Benfica after negotiating a complicated deal to snap up Renato Sanches ahead of United last summer.
